# Page 1

## Row 1

```{r}
#| title: Box Plot
p1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, fill = species)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

```{r}

#| title: Species Count by Homeworld
species_count <- starwars %>%
count(homeworld, species, sort = TRUE) %>%
drop_na()

p2 <- ggplot(species_count, aes(x = reorder(homeworld, n), y = n, fill = species)) +
geom_col() +
coord_flip() +
labs(
title = "Number of Characters by Homeworld and Species",
x = "Homeworld",
y = "Count"
) +
theme_light()

ggplotly(p2)

```
